mapper.select:
SELECT CASE a.Direction WHEN 0 THEN '正常行驶' ELSE '逆行' END as directionName, CASE a.Is_Straddle WHEN 0 THEN '否' ELSE '是' end as isStraddleName, CASE a.Lane_No WHEN 1 THEN '超车道' WHEN 2 THEN '行车道' ELSE '应急车道' end as laneNoName, CASE WHEN a.Over_Weight_Ratio>0 THEN '超重' ELSE '不超重' end as overWeightRatioName, a.*,b.Station_Name,b.Route_Name, c.License_Plate_Color,d.Vehicle_Type_Name from (select a.* from t_vehicle_overweight_temp a where a.Over_Weight>0 and a.Total_Weight <(SELECT Crux_Weight FROM crux_weight WHERE Del_State = 1 AND lv = 2) and
#{startTime} <= a.Evt_Time and
a.Evt_Time <= #{endTime} and
FIND_IN_SET(a.Station_IP ,#{stationPorts}) ORDER BY a.Evt_Time desc ) a LEFT JOIN station_site b on a.Station_IP=b.Station_Port LEFT JOIN license_plate c ON a.Plate_Color=c.License_Plate_No LEFT JOIN vehicle_type d ON a.Class_Index=d.Vehicle_Type_No

SELECT CASE a.Direction WHEN 0 THEN '正常行驶' ELSE '逆行' END as directionName, CASE a.Is_Straddle WHEN 0 THEN '否' ELSE '是' end as isStraddleName, CASE a.Lane_No WHEN 1 THEN '超车道' WHEN 2 THEN '行车道' ELSE '应急车道' end as laneNoName, CASE WHEN a.Over_Weight_Ratio>0 THEN '超重' ELSE '不超重' end as overWeightRatioName, a.*,b.Station_Name,b.Route_Name, c.License_Plate_Color,d.Vehicle_Type_Name from (select a.* from t_vehicle_overweight_temp a where date(Evt_Time) = curdate() and Over_Weight>0 and a.Total_Weight <(SELECT Crux_Weight FROM crux_weight WHERE Del_State = 1 AND lv = 2) and FIND_IN_SET(a.Station_IP ,#{stationPorts}) ORDER BY a.Evt_Time desc ) a LEFT JOIN station_site b on a.Station_IP=b.Station_Port LEFT JOIN license_plate c ON a.Plate_Color=c.License_Plate_No LEFT JOIN vehicle_type d ON a.Class_Index=d.Vehicle_Type_No

SELECT CASE a.Direction WHEN 0 THEN '正常行驶' ELSE '逆行' END as directionName, CASE a.Is_Straddle WHEN 0 THEN '否' ELSE '是' end as isStraddleName, CASE a.Lane_No WHEN 1 THEN '超车道' WHEN 2 THEN '行车道' ELSE '应急车道' end as laneNoName, CASE WHEN a.Over_Weight_Ratio>0 THEN '超重' ELSE '不超重' end as overWeightRatioName, a.*,b.Station_Name,b.Route_Name, c.License_Plate_Color,d.Vehicle_Type_Name from (select a.* from t_vehicle_overweight_temp a where Total_Weight>=(SELECT Crux_Weight FROM crux_weight where Del_State=1 AND lv = #{lv})and
#{startTime} <= a.Evt_Time and
a.Evt_Time <= #{endTime} and
FIND_IN_SET(a.Station_IP ,#{stationPorts}) ORDER BY a.Evt_Time desc ) a LEFT JOIN station_site b on a.Station_IP=b.Station_Port LEFT JOIN license_plate c ON a.Plate_Color=c.License_Plate_No LEFT JOIN vehicle_type d ON a.Class_Index=d.Vehicle_Type_No
mapper.insert: insert into t_vehicle_overweight(id_local,Id,Station_Id, Evt_Time, Msg_Time, Lane_No, Plate, Plate_Color, Class_Index, Length, Speed, Direction, Axles_Count, Total_Weight, Axle1, Axle2, Axle3, Axle4, Axle5, Axle6, Axle7, Axle8, Axle9, Axle10, Axle_space1, Axle_space2, Axle_space3, Axle_space4, Axle_space5, Axle_space6, Axle_space7, Axle_space8, Axle_space9, Is_Straddle, Temperature, Over_Weight, Over_Weight_Ratio, WIM_Id, LPR_id, Station_IP) values(#{idLocal},#{id},#{stationId},#{evtTime},#{msgTime},#{laneNo},#{plate},#{plateColor},#{classIndex},#{length},#{speed}, #{direction},#{axlesCount},#{totalWeight},#{axle1},#{axle2},#{axle3},#{axle4},#{axle5},#{axle6},#{axle7},#{axle8},#{axle9},#{axle10},#{axleSpace1},#{axleSpace2}, #{axleSpace3},#{axleSpace4},#{axleSpace5},#{axleSpace6},#{axleSpace7},#{axleSpace8},#{axleSpace9},#{isStraddle},#{temperature},#{overWeight},#{overWeightRatio}, #{wIMId},#{lPRId},#{stationIP})

insert into t_vehicle_overweight(id_local,Id,Station_Id, Evt_Time, Msg_Time, Lane_No, Plate, Plate_Color, Class_Index, Length, Speed, Direction, Axles_Count, Total_Weight, Axle1, Axle2, Axle3, Axle4, Axle5, Axle6, Axle7, Axle8, Axle9, Axle10, Axle_space1, Axle_space2, Axle_space3, Axle_space4, Axle_space5, Axle_space6, Axle_space7, Axle_space8, Axle_space9, Is_Straddle, Temperature, Over_Weight, Over_Weight_Ratio, WIM_Id, LPR_id, Station_IP) select id_local,Id,Station_Id, Evt_Time, Msg_Time, Lane_No, Plate, Plate_Color, Class_Index, Length, Speed, Direction, Axles_Count, Total_Weight, Axle1, Axle2, Axle3, Axle4, Axle5, Axle6, Axle7, Axle8, Axle9, Axle10, Axle_space1, Axle_space2, Axle_space3, Axle_space4, Axle_space5, Axle_space6, Axle_space7, Axle_space8, Axle_space9, Is_Straddle, Temperature, Over_Weight, Over_Weight_Ratio, WIM_Id, LPR_id, Station_IP from t_vehicle_overweight_temp where id_local=#{idLocal}
mapper.select: select a.id_local from t_vehicle_overweight_temp a where date(Evt_Time) = curdate() and Over_Weight>0 and a.Total_Weight <(SELECT Crux_Weight FROM crux_weight WHERE Del_State = 1 AND lv = 2) and FIND_IN_SET(a.Station_IP ,#{stationPorts}) ORDER BY a.Evt_Time desc
mapper.insert:
insert into t_vehicle_overweight(id_local,Id,Station_Id, Evt_Time, Msg_Time, Lane_No, Plate, Plate_Color, Class_Index, Length, Speed, Direction, Axles_Count, Total_Weight, Axle1, Axle2, Axle3, Axle4, Axle5, Axle6, Axle7, Axle8, Axle9, Axle10, Axle_space1, Axle_space2, Axle_space3, Axle_space4, Axle_space5, Axle_space6, Axle_space7, Axle_space8, Axle_space9, Is_Straddle, Temperature, Over_Weight, Over_Weight_Ratio, WIM_Id, LPR_id, Station_IP) values
(#{item.idLocal},#{item.id},#{item.stationId},#{item.evtTime},#{item.msgTime},#{item.laneNo},#{item.plate},#{item.plateColor},#{item.classIndex},#{item.length},#{item.speed}, #{item.direction},#{item.axlesCount},#{item.totalWeight},#{item.axle1},#{item.axle2},#{item.axle3},#{item.axle4},#{item.axle5},#{item.axle6},#{item.axle7},#{item.axle8},#{item.axle9},#{item.axle10},#{item.axleSpace1},#{item.axleSpace2}, #{item.axleSpace3},#{item.axleSpace4},#{item.axleSpace5},#{item.axleSpace6},#{item.axleSpace7},#{item.axleSpace8},#{item.axleSpace9},#{item.isStraddle},#{item.temperature},#{item.overWeight},#{item.overWeightRatio}, #{item.wIMId},#{item.lPRId},#{item.stationIP})
mapper.delete:
delete from t_vehicle_overweight_temp where id_local in
#{item.idLocal}
mapper.select:
SELECT CASE a.Direction WHEN 0 THEN '正常行驶' ELSE '逆行' END as directionName, CASE a.Is_Straddle WHEN 0 THEN '否' ELSE '是' end as isStraddleName, CASE a.Lane_No WHEN 1 THEN '超车道' WHEN 2 THEN '行车道' ELSE '应急车道' end as laneNoName, CASE WHEN a.Over_Weight_Ratio>0 THEN '超重' ELSE '不超重' end as overWeightRatioName, a.*,b.Station_Name,b.Route_Name, c.License_Plate_Color,d.Vehicle_Type_Name from (select a.* from t_vehicle_overweight a where Over_Weight>0 and a.Total_Weight <(SELECT Crux_Weight FROM crux_weight WHERE Del_State = 1 AND lv = 2) and
#{startTime} <= a.Evt_Time and
a.Evt_Time <= #{endTime} and
FIND_IN_SET(a.Station_IP ,#{stationPorts}) ORDER BY a.Evt_Time desc ) a LEFT JOIN station_site b on a.Station_IP=b.Station_Port LEFT JOIN license_plate c ON a.Plate_Color=c.License_Plate_No LEFT JOIN vehicle_type d ON a.Class_Index=d.Vehicle_Type_No
